EmailTemplate.description: Springfield Breakfast and Lunch series reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Springfield Breakfast and Lunch series reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Springfield Breakfast and lunch series reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s just around the corner! American Student Assistance’s Interactive Feedback Session
We look forward to seeing you for lunch at an interactive feedback session on October 5 from 12 – 2 p.m. at the Springfield Marriott, 2 Boland Way, Springfield, MA.
If you have questions about this event or need more information, please contact Lynne Cao at lcao@amsa.com.
